Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons

Class DevelopmentCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.DevelopmentCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DevelopmentCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a Development Card of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. It is composed by a CardType, the number of victory points earned by buying it, the cost in terms of ResourceType, the ProductionRule which it permits. It implements Serializable interface in order to be sent through the network.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> cost
    The cost in terms of number of ResourceType needed to buy the card.
    private java.lang.String ID
    The unique ID identifying the card.
    private ProductionRule trade
    The ProductionRule which it permits.
    private CardType type
    The CardType associated.
    private int victoryPoints
    The number of victory points earned by the player who buys it.
